original_title: Les robins des bois - L'instant norvégien
overview: If you like offbeat, burlesque, absurd, sometimes scatological, but talented humor, the Robins des Bois are for you. With the Norwegian moment broadcast in NPA de Dugeon, they elaborate a grating parody of television and have almost no limits.
title: Les robins des bois - L'instant norvégien
